channel.title: [508] ::mypos command [508]
channel.description:
Does anybody have a ::mypos command for a 508 server seeing as i need one and consequently i dont have one
also while i'm making this topic does anybody know how to make it on a 508 welcome screen so that when you log on it says at the top
you last logged in from (ip here) on (date here)
thankyou for your time..

item.title: [508] ::mypos command [508]
item.dc:creator: @narutoxela narutoxela
item.description:
@narutoxela wrote:

have you tried ::coords ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2009, 08:45:07 pm[/size][hr]have you tried ::coords?[quote=“narutoxela”]have you tried ::coords ?[/quote]

if it does not work here is the code for ::mypos

} else if (cmd[0].equals("coords")) {
                    p.frames.sendMessage(p, "x: " + p.absX + ", y: " + p.absY);
                }

Read full topic
